QuestData.Title: Pooped
QuestData.Description: <Your serpent catches your gaze and ducks its head bashfully.>$B$BYou can tell that someone has gotten out of its pen and had "an accident."$B$BWell, at the rate that the hatchling's been eating, it had to come out the other end... somewhere.$B$BYou had better find the serpent's poop and clean it up before the Serpent Masters find out.
